project.name: EuroSkills 2025 Module C - REST API Development

description.summary: Build a comprehensive REST API for SkillShare Academy platform with authentication, course management, mentor booking, and credit system
description.focus: Backend API development with Laravel, JWT authentication, and business logic implementation

prerequisites: Module B database schema and sample data

key_features: JWT authentication with API token management
Course management with enrollment and progress tracking
Mentor booking system with credit-based payments
Credit earning system (3-5 credits per chapter completion)
